entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Brantford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:44 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Brantford Municipal Airport 3:00 PM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 5.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 51 %
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: NE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 7. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain showers in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
